unnormalised: **New Wheels Alert! The Auto Scene is Buzzing!**
normalised: **New Wheels Alert! The Auto Scene is Buzzing!**

unnormalised: Hey petrolheads! The automotive bazaar is hotter than a Delhi summer! This week saw a flurry of vehicle launches that'll make your jaws drop.
normalised: Hey petrolheads! The automotive bazaar is hotter than a Delhi summer! This week saw a flurry of vehicle launches that will make your jaws drop.

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra unveiled its "Scorpio N" facelift near Nashik, promising an even more rugged experience. Rumors say it's got a Dr. under the hood who seriously tweaked the engine.
normalised: First up, Mahindra unveiled its "Scorpio N" facelift near Nashik, promising an even more rugged experience. Rumors say it has got a Doctor under the hood who seriously tweaked the engine.

unnormalised: Then, Tata Motors dropped a bomb – a limited-edition Harrier in a stunning new 'Kesar' orange. Perfect for those Navratri vibes, eh? Bookings are already through the roof!
normalised: Then, Tata Motors dropped a bomb – a limited-edition Harrier in a stunning new 'Kesar' orange. Perfect for those Navratri vibes, eh? Bookings are already through the roof!

unnormalised: Not to be outdone, Maruti Suzuki launched an upgraded Baleno, now with even more gizmos than your average Bollywood film set. Plus, it boasts a whopping 360-degree camera, perfect for navigating those crowded Bangalore streets.
normalised: Not to be outdone, Maruti Suzuki launched an upgraded Baleno, now with even more gizmos than your average Bollywood film set. Plus, it boasts a whopping three hundred and sixty degree camera, perfect for navigating those crowded Bangalore streets.

unnormalised: Finally, some whispers about a new electric scooter from Ather, potentially offering a range of over 150 km and features like app-controlled charging. This would be great for those 'bijli' (electricity) bill savings! Price is expected around Rs. 1.5 Lakh. Land requirements for setting up charging stations are predicted to increase by almost 200 sq ft per 10 vehicles. Stay tuned for more updates on these exciting launches!
normalised: Finally, some whispers about a new electric scooter from Ather, potentially offering a range of over one hundred and fifty kilometer and features like app-controlled charging. This would be great for those 'bijli' (electricity) bill savings! Price is expected around rupee one point five lakh. Land requirements for setting up charging stations are predicted to increase by almost two hundred square feet per ten vehicles. Stay tuned for more updates on these exciting launches!
